amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being available for the National Forest Recreation Association in Woodlake, California.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the $50,000 appropriation in the bill for the National Forest Recreation Association in Woodlake, California.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 69 - 352 (Roll no. 700).
